vague_description: A farmer needs to efficiently transport a specific amount of corn to the city while complying with constraints related to vehicle capacity and speed.
detailed_description: A corn farmer sends his corn to the city by either tractor or car. A tractor can carry \param{Tc} kg of corn while a car can carry \param{Cc} kg of corn. Since tractors are very slow, the number of cars used has to be at least \param{Ratio} times the number of tractors used. If at least \param{MinCorn} kg of corn need to be sent to the city, minimize the total number of tractors and cars needed.
target_objective: Minimize the total number of tractors and cars needed to send corn to the city
target_constraints: Each tractor can carry up to Tc kg of corn
Each car can carry up to Cc kg of corn
Number of cars used must be at least Ratio times the number of tractors used
At least MinCorn kg of corn must be sent to the city
target_parameters: Capacity of the tractor for carrying corn
Capacity of the car for carrying corn
Minimum ratio of number of cars used to number of tractors used
Minimum amount of corn to be sent to the city
